Articles.Content:
First time I have had this happen, got a ship in orbit and went back to the Space Center, then I wanted to check something and went into the Tracking Center and things were not normal (screenshots below), and clicking on exit did absolutely nothing.

Nothing shows up in the vessel/object list either.

![screenshot2_2.png](http://i221.photobucket.com/albums/dd134/mark_perryman/KSP%20Stuff/screenshot2_2.png)

And when I mouse over the Vessel List:

![screenshot3_1.png](http://i221.photobucket.com/albums/dd134/mark_perryman/KSP%20Stuff/screenshot3_1.png)

And last but not least my Mod list:

![Mod%20List.jpg](http://i221.photobucket.com/albums/dd134/mark_perryman/KSP%20Stuff/Mod%20List.jpg)
